alert.note: Alert for Larimer (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 6:10PM MDT until July 04 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LARIMER COUNTY... At 610 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Buford to 5 miles northwest of Mishawaka, or along a line extending from 25 miles southeast of Laramie to 24 miles northwest of Fort Collins, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Poudre Park and Livermore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
